bundles.title: Malice
bundles.description: This perk will be active only if no other Passive perks equipped, increases attack power 50% when Bloodseek is at maximum

itemsInBundleWithData.title: Malice
itemsInBundleWithData.description: This perk will be active only if no other Passive perks equipped, increases attack power 50% when Bloodseek is at maximum

bundles.title: after shock
bundles.description: While using Invisible Form for 20 seconds or more, increases attack power 20% lasts for 8 seconds. This perk will activate only when leaving Invisible Form with Left-Shift

itemsInBundleWithData.title: after shock
itemsInBundleWithData.description: While using Invisible Form for 20 seconds or more, increases attack power 20% lasts for 8 seconds. This perk will activate only when leaving Invisible Form with Left-Shift

bundles.title: Serial Killer
bundles.description: After performing an Execution, reveals Survivors' Aura.

itemsInBundleWithData.title: Serial Killer
itemsInBundleWithData.description: After performing an Execution, reveals Survivors' Aura.

bundles.title: Special Receptor
bundles.description: This perk will make Survivors bearly see the Specter during Invisible Form, during Invisible Form, the Specter will always see Survivor Auras

itemsInBundleWithData.title: Special Receptor
itemsInBundleWithData.description: This perk will make Survivors bearly see the Specter during Invisible Form, during Invisible Form, the Specter will always see Survivor Auras

bundles.title: First Stride
bundles.description: This perk will affect only the Specter with Move Speed 2 or less. Leaving Invisible Form will grant full Blookseek

itemsInBundleWithData.title: First Stride
itemsInBundleWithData.description: This perk will affect only the Specter with Move Speed 2 or less. Leaving Invisible Form will grant full Blookseek

bundles.title: Stamina Drain
bundles.description: This perk will affect only the Specter with Move Speed 2 or less. Constantly aim the target on a Survivor will drain the targeted Survivor's Stamina 2 unit per seconds. Stamina will stop draining if the targeted Survivor's stamina is below 20 unit.

itemsInBundleWithData.title: Stamina Drain
itemsInBundleWithData.description: This perk will affect only the Specter with Move Speed 2 or less. Constantly aim the target on a Survivor will drain the targeted Survivor's Stamina 2 unit per seconds. Stamina will stop draining if the targeted Survivor's stamina is below 20 unit.
